title: Djokovic, Kvitova Crowned Wimbledon Champions
teaser: Novak Djokovic won his first Wimbledon championship in three years beating Roger Federer. Petra Kvitova won the women's singles final. Steve Inskeep talks to Jon Wertheim of Sport's Illustrated.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
